elements.name: User register with valid data

steps.name: User open registration page
User enter gender type
User enter first name "Mohamed" and last name "Moustafa"
User select date of birth
User enter email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com"
User enter password fields "P@ssword123"
User click on register button
success registration message appears
User click on continue button to return to home page

name: User can register and has an account on the website

elements.name: User login with valid credentials

steps.name: User open login page
User enter email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User click on login button
User login successfully and return to home page

elements.name: User login with invalid credentials

steps.name: User open login page
User enter email "invalid.email@test.com" and password "invalid.password"
User click on login button
User login failed and error message appears

name: User can log in the website

elements.name: User change currency from US to Euro

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User select euro currency from drop down menu
All items prices change to euro

name: Logged user can switch between currencies US-Euro

elements.name: Logged user search using product name

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User enter a product name "book" in search text field
User click on search button
Search result appears with products related to the product name "book"

elements.name: Logged user search using product name

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User enter a product name "laptop" in search text field
User click on search button
Search result appears with products related to the product name "laptop"

elements.name: Logged user search using product name

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User enter a product name "nike" in search text field
User click on search button
Search result appears with products related to the product name "nike"

elements.name: Logged user search using product sku

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User enter a product sku "SCI_FAITH" in search text field
User click on search button
Search result appears with products related to the product sku "SCI_FAITH"

elements.name: Logged user search using product sku

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User enter a product sku "APPLE_CAM" in search text field
User click on search button
Search result appears with products related to the product sku "APPLE_CAM"

elements.name: Logged user search using product sku

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User enter a product sku "SF_PRO_11" in search text field
User click on search button
Search result appears with products related to the product sku "SF_PRO_11"

name: Logged user can search for any product

elements.name: User reset password with valid email

steps.name: User at login page
User click on forgot password link
User enter valid email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com"
User click on recover button
message appears tell user that an email has been sent to him

elements.name: User reset password with invalid email

steps.name: User at login page
User click on forgot password link
User enter valid email "invalid.email@test.com"
User click on recover button
message appears tell user this email is not found

name: User can reset his/her password successfully

elements.name: User select sub-category

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User hover to a category and click on one of its sub-categories
User will navigate to a page contains products about that sub-category

name: Logged user can select different Categories in the website

elements.name: Logged user filter products with color

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User navigate to category which has filter color options for its products
User select a specific color from options
Category products will change to be for that color only

name: Logged user can filter with color

elements.name: Logged user add different products to Shopping cart

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User navigate to Notebooks category page
User click on Add To Cart button for a product
User navigate to Books category page
User click on Add To Cart button for two books from products
User navigate to Shopping Cart page
Shopping cart will contains all selected products

name: Logged user can add different products to Shopping cart

elements.name: User add htc phone product to Wishlist

steps.name: User at the homepage
User click on add to wishlist button of htc phone
success message appears which confirm adding of the product

elements.name: User add htc phone product to Wishlist and validate its quantity

steps.name: User at the homepage
User click on add to wishlist button of htc phone
User click on Wishlist link
User will navigate to wishlist page which contain htc phone product with its quantity

name: User can add different products to Wishlist

elements.name: Logged user add different products to compare list

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User navigate to notebooks products page
User add different products to the compare list
User navigate to compare products list page
compare products list will contain all selected products

name: Logged user can add different products to compare list

elements.name: Logged user purchase with cash payment

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User select product from a category
User add the product to the shopping cart
User click on checkout button to purchase the product
User enter mandatory valid information for payment
User click on confirm button to complete the payment
Success completed order message appears

name: Logged user can purchase product from the website

elements.name: Logged user select awesome tag

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User open notebooks category page
User click on awesome tag from product tags
User will navigate to a page contains products related to awesome tag

elements.name: Logged user select cell tag

steps.name: User log in with email "mohamed.moustafa@test.com" and password "P@ssword123"
User open notebooks category page
User click on cell tag from product tags
User will navigate to a page contains products related to cell tag

name: Logged user can select different tags
